name: Kemar Daley
description: Within the past eight years, I have dedicated my skills, experiences, and services internationally and locally from my remote office. This has allowed me to partner and work with top-tier startups and established businesses worldwide. Personally, delivering, editing, and proofreading content is a passion and is not considered 'work' to me most of the time. I do this day in and day out as I gradually hone my skills to become a master in my field and ultimately a more professional being through experience.
